useCase.name: Interview Participants
useCase.description: As a User Researcher, I want to select and schedule interviews with potential participants to gather data for my research project.

preconditions.precondition: The User Researcher has access to the Research Recruitment Tool and the Research Participant Database.

successEndConditions.condition: The final list of interview participants is confirmed and ready for the research interviews.

useCase.trigger: The User Researcher identifies criteria for participants.

mainSequence.step: The User Researcher identifies criteria for the participants.
The Research Recruitment Tool queries the potential participants from the Research Participant Database.
The Research Participant Database returns a list of potential participants.
The User Researcher reviews the list of potential participants.
The User Researcher selects potential interviewees.
The Research Recruitment Tool sends invitations for interviews to the selected participants.
The Research Recruitment Tool reports responses (accept/decline) to the User Researcher.
The User Researcher schedules interviews with the participants who accepted the invitation.
The Research Recruitment Tool confirms the interview schedules with the participants.
The participants confirm their attendance for the interviews.
The Research Recruitment Tool finalizes the list of interview participants.
